title: Blood Moon Thresh, soul collection color glitch
body: Hi there, I got Blood Moon Thresh very recently and I encountered a pretty annoying bug (at least I think it was a bug) where Thresh would glow his normal bright green when i would collect souls, instead of the red which looks cooler and doesn't absolutely clash with how the skin looks. I would love if this could be patched soon, or something, thanks for taking the time to read through this :)

replies.body:
Thanks for the report! We'll take a look! 

Are you referring to him glowing green, or sometimes the souls you were collecting would be green?
I've noticed it too. When you collect a soul the green "flickering sheen" that goes across thresh's model will be green and not red.

Sorry, so sorry, but i don't check the boards often. :'(
This is what I mean. It's really bothersome.
